attributes.action: Remove Boris Johnson as foreign secretary due to the resulting global ridicule
attributes.additional_details:
This artical on the BBC web site says it all
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-36790977
attributes.background: The foreign secretary represents our country all over the world. The person holding this position needs the respect of other leaders to make his voice heard. A certain level of gravitas is needed. The genial clown is not right for this particular job.
